name: Cecropia Solutions
description:
We are a full-service software development and QA solutions provider headquartered in Austin, TX with two development centers conveniently located in Costa Rica. 
We offer the very best in near-shore technical services with bilingual, highly skilled engineers. We are a growing team of talented Agile developers, Quality Assurance engineers and project managers with a wide variety of technical skills and experience ready to help you succeed.

locations.address: 9442 Capital of Texas Hwy N. Plaza One, Suite 500-132
Seattle World Trade Center 2211 Elliott Ave, Suite 200
